item.title: LG Energy Solution reviewing plan to adopt Korea-made PLC in production equipment
item.description: South Korean EV battery maker LG Energy Solution was considering using programmable logic controller (PLC) made by a compatriot company in one of its core battery production equipment.The battery maker was collaborating with LS Electric in the development of the PLC, though a spokesperson said it wa

item.title: Avaco expected to win Gen 8.6 OLED equipment order from BOE
item.description: Display equipment maker Avaco has received a letter of intent (LOI) from BOE to potentially supply equipment for the Chinese display giant’s phase two construction for its Gen 8.6 OLED factory called B16 in China.BOE had already used Avaco’s vacuum deposition transfer equipment for the first phase c

item.title: YEST to supply UTG laminators to Fine M-Tec
item.description: Equipment maker YEST said on Monday that it has won an order from Fine M-Tec, which supplies back plates for foldable smartphones, to supply ultra-thin glass (UTG) laminators.UTGs are placed on top of foldable screens. YEST offers vacuum chambers for displays and film auto laminiator used to laminat
